attributes.action: To make every Friday a non-uniform day in all uk high schools.
attributes.additional_details: To allow students to express themselves via their clothing instead of by a single stud earring and a bag.
attributes.background: To change Fridays to allow students in uk high school the right to wear their own personal choice of clothes, with obvious restrictions to keep rules in place and students safe.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about non-school uniform days are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

If you would like your school to change its policy around non-school uniform days you could raise this directly with your school.
